snippet: In “Hack My Brain,” the host Todd Sampson submits himself to assorted exercises that are supposed to improve his mental prowess.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews Science Channel three-part television special Hack My Brain.
lead_paragraph: In “Hack My Brain,” the host Todd Sampson submits himself to assorted exercises that are supposed to improve his mental prowess.

headline.seo: ‘Hack My Brain,’ Self-Improvement on Science Channel
